conbody.p: The menu model file describes all menu items of a business activity packaged in the runtime application. A menu item represents a call to a business function or contains submenu items. This hierarchical organization is represented in the Menu Designer by a tree.

There can be only one menu model per activity. For menu models, activities are packaged so that they come first under the profile. In the following example, Default is the profile and aaa the activity:
A menu item can be secured through a security role, limiting access to authorized users only.
